name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Capture the Moment'.

subtitles.original: ほら 耳を澄ませば
subtitles.english: See, if you listen closely

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because you're not alone

subtitles.original: 諦めかけて心が閉じても
subtitles.english: Even if you're about to give up and your heart closes

subtitles.original: 君が背中を押してくれたよね
subtitles.english: You pushed me forward, didn't you?

subtitles.original: 春の蕾が花開く頃は
subtitles.english: When the spring buds begin to bloom

subtitles.original: 隣で笑い合おうね
subtitles.english: Let's laugh together side by side

subtitles.original: 桜風に踊る空 君と出会ったこの場所で
subtitles.english: The sky dancing in the cherry blossom breeze, here where I met you

subtitles.original: どれくらいの思い出 ぎゅっと溢れそうになるかな
subtitles.english: How many memories will overflow as I hold them tight?

subtitles.original: 君と描く言の葉は 未来もきっと残るから
subtitles.english: The words I draw with you will surely remain in the future

subtitles.original: 汗をかいた後は そうさ 強くなれるんだ
subtitles.english: After sweating it out, yes, we can become stronger

subtitles.original: 意地を張って 恥をかいて いじけたって それでも
subtitles.english: Being stubborn, being embarrassed, even if we sulk

subtitles.original: 君がそばで見守ってくれたから
subtitles.english: Because you were there by my side watching over me

subtitles.original: ありがとうだよ
subtitles.english: Thank you so much

subtitles.original: 君と出会えたこの空 これからもずっと咲かせるよ
subtitles.english: This sky where I could meet you, I'll keep it blooming forever

subtitles.original: あの涙が今の僕らを繋げて
subtitles.english: Those tears connect us now

subtitles.original: この心に君のカケラがいるから
subtitles.english: Because there's a piece of you in this heart

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not alone

subtitles.original: Capture the Moment\n作詞 金丸佳史 / 中野領太 作曲・編曲 中野領太
subtitles.english: Capture the Moment\nLyrics: Yoshifumi Kanamaru / Ryota Nakano Composition & Arrangement: Ryota Nakano

subtitles.original: いつか描いた文字の中
subtitles.english: In the letters I once wrote

subtitles.original: 目を閉じた先に色付く景色が揺れた
subtitles.english: A colorful landscape swayed before my closed eyes

subtitles.original: 少し戸惑う風の中
subtitles.english: In a slightly confusing wind

subtitles.original: 重なる花びら 私たちの声
subtitles.english: Overlapping petals, our voices

subtitles.original: 一瞬一瞬捕まえるみたいに
subtitles.english: Like catching moment after moment

subtitles.original: もっともっと踏み出せたら
subtitles.english: If we could take even more steps forward

subtitles.original: (We are one)
subtitles.english: (We are one)

subtitles.original: あの涙が今の僕らを繋げて
subtitles.english: Those tears connect us now

subtitles.original: この心に君のカケラがいるから
subtitles.english: Because there's a piece of you in this heart

subtitles.original: 強くなくてもいい
subtitles.english: It's okay not to be strong

subtitles.original: 今の光を
subtitles.english: This light now

subtitles.original: 僕と君と集う空に放つ
subtitles.english: Unleash it into the sky where you and I gather

subtitles.original: この奇跡を僕らでそっと輝かせるから
subtitles.english: Because we will gently make this miracle shine

subtitles.original: 力が湧くから
subtitles.english: Because power wells up within

subtitles.original: 新たな種を握りしめ
subtitles.english: Gripping a new seed

subtitles.original: 遠い未来へと強く願い込め蒔いた
subtitles.english: I sowed it with a strong wish for the distant future

subtitles.original: 希望の風を吹かせては
subtitles.english: Letting the wind of hope blow

subtitles.original: 理想の花びら 祈る明日の空
subtitles.english: Ideal petals, praying to tomorrow's sky

subtitles.original: 何百億も光る星みたいに
subtitles.english: Like tens of billions of shining stars

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと終わらないから
subtitles.english: Because it will never, ever end

subtitles.original: この笑顔が過去を強く抱きしめて
subtitles.english: This smile strongly embraces the past

subtitles.original: 今未来にこの手伸ばしてゆくから
subtitles.english: Because I'm reaching out to the future now

subtitles.original: 時に転んでも
subtitles.english: Even if we stumble sometimes

subtitles.original: 空を見上げよう
subtitles.english: Let's look up at the sky

subtitles.original: 笑い日々を刻んでゆく
subtitles.english: Carving out days of laughter

subtitles.original: 次の夢を掴み取るって約束するから
subtitles.english: Because I promise to grasp the next dream

subtitles.original: 踏み出そうここから
subtitles.english: Let's step forward from here

subtitles.original: (We are with you We are with you)
subtitles.english: (We are with you We are with you)
